title: Left-align LilyPage content in a single column (remove indentation)

requirements.text: Update the Lily page layout (frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx) so the pond avatar, metadata/title/description, image/link block, and engagement/action buttons are all left-aligned in a single column with no extra left indentation between these sections.

quotes: Be left aligned in a single column

acceptanceCriteria: On the Lily page, the left edge of the pond avatar aligns with the left edge of the title/description text, image/link block, and engagement/action row (i.e., no additional horizontal offset caused by a side-by-side avatar/content layout).
The page remains a single readable column within the existing max width container (no unintended horizontal scrolling on mobile or desktop).
All existing Lily page functionality remains intact (view count increment, like/unlike, share, bookmark, ribbit creation, lightbox modal).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*
Backend must remain single-actor (no new backend canisters/services).
nonGoals: No backend data model or API changes.
No redesign of other pages/components beyond the Lily page alignment fix.
No new features added to the Lily page (only layout/alignment correction).
